duties_responsibilities.duty: Prepare and cook food items based on standardized recipes for Banquets and Catering, ensuring highest standards of quality and appeal.
Maintain cleanliness, sanitation, and safety in the kitchen and work areas to minimize waste and maximize cost/production ratio.
Approach all encounters with guests and associates in a friendly, service-oriented manner.
Maintain high standards of personal appearance, grooming, and compliance with hospitality standards.
Comply with certification requirements for Food Handlers Safety, etc.
Complete necessary food and station preparations to ensure prompt and efficient service during operating hours.
Prepare and service food for Associate Cafeteria as specified by the restaurant leadership.
Maintain post on the kitchen line during operating hours to prepare food to order with efficiency and quality.
Prepare food according to hotel standards and specifications following Aimbridge Hospitality standard recipes.
Maintain cleanliness and organization of all storage areas and kitchen equipment.
Assist in storage and rotation of food items according to hotel procedures.
Operate and maintain cleanliness of all kitchen equipment.
Assist in and perform any other duties as requested by management.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or equivalent. Food Handlers Certification required.
